game.name: Christmas adventure
game.description:
You are going to enter into a unique Christmas challenge where your favorite Santa has got into a big trouble. He wants to grab the colorful balls, but unable to understand how to attempt this challenging task on his own. Do you think that you are skilled enough to take this challenging task? Join Christmas Adventure and be prepared to guide Santa on his most awaited trip! There are multiple platforms that are full of death-defying and deadly challenges.
 
It is not going to be easy at all since this cute character has a plenty of stolen gifts to recover. This is a strange land for him so he does not know how to meet with different challenges. Your objective in this free online platform game is to save all of the gifts from the evil dragon to become a Christmas hero. Keep defeating all bad guys you see on his way and try to stay on top of the platforms to spot the exit in each level!

There are unique and challenging 20 levels to explore in this html5 Christmas game. This problem occurs when he is driving his car through an old forest. Everything available in his hands is scattered here and there. Now you have to help him to collect all his gifts and return his town on time to save the celebration of Christmas. This hilarious mobile game features bright artwork as well as clear and crisp search scenes. Check out more Santa games for kids that are free to play online, no download required!
